;

;October 3, 2023, United States A shocking scene unfolded in the House of Representatives. Proposed by Republican Congressman Matt Gaetz, a majority of 216 votes to 210 voted to remove House Speaker McCarthy, who will only take office in January 2023.

;

;Since taking office on January 7, 2023, McCarthy has only been in office for 269 days, making him the speaker of the House of Representatives with the third shortest term in U.S. history. This is also the first time in the history of American politics that a speaker has been removed from office.

;

;On the surface, the reason for McCarthy's removal was that he cooperated with the Democratic Party to pass a temporary federal funding bill before the October 1st deadline, which prevented the Biden government from shutting down and angered those in the party. Far right. The current hijacking of the entire party by far-right groups within the Republican Party has made it difficult to bridge the gap between the traditional right-wing represented by McCarthy and the far-right represented by Matt Gaetz. This may be the deeper reason for McCarthy's removal. reason.

;

;;

;

;On September 18, 2023, in Washington, the United States, former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi (front right) and Representative Maxine Waters (front left) Conversation outside the Capitol ;(Visual China/Photo);

;

;The budget is the trigger

;

;November 2022 In the mid-term elections, the Republican Party won 222 seats in the 435-member House of Representatives, becoming the majority party, but with only a slim 9-vote advantage. This made the far-right "Freedom Caucus" (Freedom Caucus) with only a dozen people a " The key few forces are those who fail to succeed but fail to succeed. In January 2023, Rep. Kevin McCarthy, a Republican from California, was elected speaker after a record 15 rounds of voting. The reason was the constant vetoes from members of the "Freedom Caucus", of which Matt Gaetz was the leader. member.

;

;In the end, McCarthy gave them major concessions, including allowing anyone in the party to bring a motion to remove the speaker—a new rule that McCarthy later backed down to, which he himself had nodded to months earlier. .

;

;The cause of the matter is the budget. The U.S. government's new fiscal year begins on October 1 of each year. Presumably to allow time for protracted bargaining in Congress, the Biden administration had already proposed a budget for the next year as early as March 2023, but the two parties have been unable to reach a consensus in the next six months.

;

;The far-right Republican Party hopes to significantly reduce government spending to alleviate the serious fiscal deficit and ease the debt crisis. At the same time, it will spend more money on domestic issues such as the border refugee crisis and reduce aid to Ukraine; the Democratic Party believes that Assisting vulnerable groups is the government's obligation. Supporting specific industries through tax cuts and subsidies is to maintain the competitiveness of the United States. Aiding Ukraine is an international obligation of the United States as a global leader, so it opposes spending cuts.

;

;The matter was delayed until the end of September. If there is no budget, according to the law, after October 1, except for a few essential public services, all other government workers must take unpaid leave. This is commonly known as a "government shutdown."

;

;Since 1976, there have been 21 government shutdowns in the U.S. government, most of which occurred during Clinton’s term as president. The then Speaker of the House of Representatives, Gingrich, caused many artificial shutdowns because of his disagreement with Clinton. The "Government Shutdown" incident; the longest government shutdown occurred from 2018 to 2019, when then-President Trump and congressional Democrats were in a stalemate over the construction of a border wall, resulting in the failure of the government budget to pass. That government shutdown lasted 35 days, running through the Christmas and New Year holidays.

;

;Seeing that the government shutdown was about to happen again, House Speaker McCarthy pushed the House to propose an interim budget a few hours before the deadline. It was finally passed by a vote of 335 to 91, and then the bill was passed in the Senate It also passed by a vote of 88 to 9 to extend federal funding until November 17. The crisis of government shutdown is temporarily lifted.

;

;Although McCarthy deliberately excluded the content of aid to Ukraine in the interim budget to appease the extreme right wing of the party, the latter did not appreciate it. They found it difficult to accept McCarthy's betrayal of cooperating with the Democratic Party, so they left it to the Democratic Party. Gates took the lead in proposing a motion to remove McCarthy from office.

;

;Although McCarthy was dismissed by the Republican Party because he cooperated with the Democratic Party to pass the interim budget, politics is realistic. The Democratic Party does not intend to help McCarthy retain the speakership, and they also have a high degree of distrust in McCarthy, including McCarthy. Not long ago, he also led the launch of the impeachment investigation against President Biden, and tried his best to please former President Trump after the Capitol riots on January 6, 2021, etc. The 2024 election is only a year and a month away, and Democrats are probably happy to see their competitors in chaos.

;

;It is said that the centrists of the Democratic Party had communicated with McCarthy in private before, but McCarthy did not show goodwill and put forward clear exchange conditions, so the Democratic Party had no incentive to come to the rescue. Jeffries, the Democratic leader of the House of Representatives, said in a letter to all his fellow Democratic members: "It is the responsibility of Republican members to end the Republican civil war in the House of Representatives." As a result, all Democrats voted in support of the recall bill.

;

;In the end, of the 216 votes supporting the recall, Gates and his Republican comrades only contributed 8 votes, while the Democrats contributed 208 votes; the Republicans voted 210 against; among the 7 who did not vote, 4 Democrats and 3 Republicans. Gates' political revenge, combined with the Democratic Party's political calculations, ended McCarthy's career as speaker just 72 hours after the interim budget was passed.

;

;McCarthy finally accepted the vote results with a smile and said he did not regret cooperating with the Democratic Party. It should be said that he demonstrated the sense of responsibility and responsibility of a veteran politician. This kind of cross-party cooperation based on national interests was originally very common and considered a fine tradition of American politics. However, in recent years, due to the deepening of partisan differences, it has become It's becoming increasingly rare.

;

;;

;

;On October 3, 2023, live footage of the House of Representatives voting to remove Republican House Speaker McCarthy in Washington, D.C.;(Xinhua News Agency/Photo );

;

;Who is Matt Gates?

;

;Matt Gaetz, who took the lead in calling for McCarthy’s removal, was born in May 1982. He has been a federal representative representing Florida’s first district since 2016 and has been re-elected three times. His father, Don Gates, was also a politician and served as president of the Florida Senate. Matt Gates had previously been implicated in a scandal of paying for sex with underage girls, but the Justice Department finally decided not to prosecute in February 2023 after a two-year investigation.

;

;Matt Gaetz represents a congressional district with conservative values. Since running for the House of Representatives for the first time in 2016, he has led by more than 30% in a total of 4 elections. , there is no need to worry that his idiosyncratic behavior will have a negative impact on his political career. Voters obviously like his ideas.

;

;In terms of philosophy, Gates actually has a lot in common with the left wing of the Democratic Party, such as opposing foreign military intervention, supporting the decriminalization of certain recreational drugs such as marijuana, and calling for stronger supervision of large technology companies. ,etc. But Gates is often classified as far-right, more because of his combative style than ideology.

;

;The ostensible reason why Gates is so obsessed with removing McCarthy is that McCarthy worked with Democrats to pass an interim budget, allowing the government to avoid a shutdown, which is beneficial to the Biden administration. However, the underlying reason is still personal political interests: Gates is a fan of Trump, and his political methods are similar to Trump's.

;

;Like Trump, Gates is good at turning politics into entertainment and using social media and Fox News to build momentum for himself and attract voters to maintain his personal attention. For example, in October 2019, during the impeachment investigation of Trump by House Democrats, he led more than a dozen Republican congressmen into the sensitive information isolation room of Congress and live broadcast the confidential impeachment hearing content to social media; the new coronavirus epidemic During this period, he once wore a gas mask to work; then in early 2023, he repeatedly vetoed McCarthy as speaker and removed McCarthy this time. US media speculated that the congressman is considering running for Florida governor in 2026: due to term limits, current Governor Ron DeSantis will not be able to seek re-election by then.

;

;The rise of Matt Gates, like the rise of Trump, has a profound social background: the development of globalization has caused a large number of blue-collar jobs in the United States to be transferred overseas, and the knowledge economy has made educational attainment and success Directly linked, and less than 30% of American adults have college diplomas. As a result, the biggest losers in this process are the white middle class who have graduated from high school but do not have college diplomas. Most of these people have gathered under the Republican Party. They are opposed to globalization. dissatisfaction, and the conservative attitude of never giving in on moral issues such as anti-abortion, anti-same-sex marriage, and gun rights, are all reflected in the Republican Party's platform and style of conduct. Whether it is Trump’s vulgarity or the sex trafficking scandals in which he and Matt Gaetz have been accused, their supporters regard it as a manifestation of “masculinity” and are harmless.

;

;Of course, Gates alone cannot remove McCarthy. Seven other Republican congressmen agreed to remove him, most of them from the far-right "Liberty Caucus" in the party. This caucus originated from the "Tea Party" wave in 2010. Its members were very dissatisfied with the inability of the mainstream Republican Party to check the strict fiscal discipline adopted by the Obama administration. They believed that it was necessary to establish a new organization to exert the collective influence of right-wing members and appeal to the Republican leadership. Put pressure on them to restore the tradition of "financial prudence".

;

;The "Freedom Caucus" is an alternative within the Republican Party, which is dedicated to having trouble with the top leaders of the party. In 2015, the "Freedom Caucus" believed that then-House Speaker John Boehner was not tough enough on Obama and forced the former to resign; in 2017, the "Freedom Caucus" tried to launch a challenge to then-Speaker Paul Ryan through its internal members, and the latter Forced to resign early to avoid humiliation. From this point of view, McCarthy's recall motion by members of the "Freedom Caucus" is just another flashback of history.

;

;;

;

;On October 3, 2023, in Washington, the United States, McCarthy spoke to media reporters. The U.S. House of Representatives voted on the same day to pass a resolution to remove Republican House Speaker McCarthy ;(Xinhua News Agency/Photo);

;

;Pelosi was Impact

;

;After McCarthy steps down, according to the rules of procedure of the House of Representatives, the position of acting speaker will be filled by a person recommended by the former speaker himself. At the top of McCarthy's recommendation list is North Carolina Rep. Patrick McHenry, a close McCarthy ally who has begun serving as acting speaker, responsible for convening next week to re-elect the speaker.

;

;McHenry was furious at McCarthy's ouster. In retaliation, he emailed former Speaker Pelosi to vacate her office in the Capitol, and also expelled former House Majority Leader Steny Hoyer, a Democrat. According to tradition, these two people have previously retained their offices in Congress. It is rumored that the vacated office of Pelosi will be allocated to McCarthy. Staff had already started cleaning the office on the evening of the 3rd. After McCarthy was dismissed, she criticized Pelosi for "treachery" and accused her of failing to stand up for him at critical moments as promised.

;

;On the Republican side, some congressmen held up their mobile phones at the voting site to show fundraising text messages sent by Matt Gaetz’s camp, criticizing him for attracting attention just to attract more donations and sponsorships. Some pro-Republican parties The media also criticized Gates as a liar and a reputation seeker. The other seven Republican congressmen who voted after Matt Gaetz were either wildly criticized on TV shows or threatened to cut off financial support from the party.

;

;;

;

;On June 1, 2023, pedestrians walked past the "Treasury Debt Clock" in New York, USA. The National Debt Clock updates the total U.S. public debt in real time and shows how much each American household has to shoulder. On the same day, the U.S. Senate voted and approved the bill related to the agreement reached by Democratic President Biden and Republican Speaker of the House of Representatives McCarthy on raising the federal government’s debt ceiling, thereby avoiding a U.S. debt default;(Xinhua Social/Picture);

;

;The canvassing for votes for the new speaker has already begun. McCarthy has stated that he will not participate in the competition again. Currently, Scalise, the majority leader of the House of Representatives and the second-ranking figure in the Republican Party, , House Republican Whip Emmer and House Judiciary Committee Chairman Jordan are already eager to try. Former President Trump was not directly involved in this infighting, but there are still Republican congressmen who have expressed support for him to become the speaker. Legally, there is no requirement to be a member to serve as speaker, but according to the House Republican rules of procedure, anyone accused of a felony cannot hold a leadership position, and Trump has been sued four times, regardless of whether he admits it or not, and the charges are Basically all are felonies. Moreover, Trump’s goal is to be re-elected as president, so it is impossible for him to really go into this muddy water.

;

;But no matter who ultimately takes office, it will not change the political reality that the Republican Party is kidnapped by a small number of far-right parties. His future situation will not be much better than McCarthy's.

;A few days ago, Beiqing Daily published an in-depth report on "The hidden worries behind teachers' extensive reporting: trapped in self-certification" , choosing to "lie down" caused concern and discussion, and many voices expressing sympathy for the teacher appeared on social media. However, how long can such voices last, and to what extent can they be translated into actual support for teachers’ work? The answer is probably not optimistic.

;

;The report listed various unreasonable reports: a teacher was reported for responding to parents’ messages three hours late; a teacher wore a skirt and was complained by a student’s mother as “not like a serious person”; A teacher was reported by his parents as being inexperienced and unable to lead the class on the second day after he joined the job... It makes people feel that some parents use their strong energy to find faults and act wantonly.

;

;The report quoted some teachers as saying that the problem stems from "preparation and hostility permeating the gap between schools and families, and the vicious news of many teachers beating children has exacerbated distrust. Some people will take advantage of this emotion." , to satisfy their own demands.” This explanation is that: some teachers have lost their ethics → public opinion added fuel to the flames → an atmosphere of "precaution and hostility" → some parents took the opportunity to cause trouble and profit. This chain is reasonable but incomplete, and there is still room to further dig into the root of the problem. .

;

;First of all, the home-school relationship has gone through a good period. This stage was roughly before the rise of the mobile Internet and smartphones. The main setting for teachers and parents to meet was the parent-teacher conference, which was a rare meeting on weekdays and they were contacted by phone for important matters. This brings a benefit: "Distance creates beauty." Teachers and parents do their own thing without interfering with each other.

;

;Technological progress is a double-edged sword. WeChat home-school groups and DingTalk groups have been established one after another, allowing teachers and parents to communicate in real time. On the surface, it improves the communication efficiency between the two parties, but it also invisibly removes the traditional barriers and boundaries between home and school. From then on, school teachers asked parents to check in here and pick up the relay in that group. Most parents did not dare not cooperate even if they were busy at work, for fear that their children would be treated differently in school.

;

;In this transformation process, the teacher is only an executor and cannot help himself. But as more and more educational and non-educational tasks are carried out, and are pressed down to parents through the school-teacher chain, schools have become grassroots governance organizations, woven into every family with children. As the saying goes, "little hands hold big hands", children become the leverage to control parents.

;

;Under the surface obedience and harmony, tensions between the school, teachers and parents are constantly accumulating. This tension stems from parents’ dissatisfaction with being subject to various controls and disciplines by the school. If they cannot find an exit here, they will find an exit there.

;

;At the same time, the distrust between home and school is also deepening. In addition to the "vicious news about many teachers beating children" mentioned in the report, it also includes the fact that the canteen in the school is sold at a sky-high price and students are not allowed to do it themselves. Bringing in bedding, all the controversies surrounding prepared meals, etc. all contribute to and exacerbate parent distrust of schools. These may not all be the school's responsibility. Teachers often take the blame, but parents will (only) point the finger directly at the school.

;

;Secondly, there is no need to excuse some parents. It is true that some parents are troubled and unreasonable. At this time, the response and actions of the school and its authorities are very critical: if you adhere to the principles and do not get along with each other, although you may face a lot of pressure at a time, you can avoid forming bad incentives for other parents and avoid long-term consequences. , also established justice. Unfortunately, they often adopt a calm attitude. Any complaints from parents are taken seriously. "I would rather submit to teachers than to parents" is based on the same mentality. In this way, can there not be too many unreasonable complaints from parents?

;

;Beiqing Daily reported: A 12345 operator in Chengdu believed that some reports were "outrageous" in her opinion. A parent called to complain because he was dissatisfied with the teacher's arrangement of his children's seats in the back row of the classroom. The parent admitted that although the teacher had clearly stated that seats were arranged according to height, he still felt it was unreasonable because those sitting in the back were He is a poor student. Although his child is tall, he studies well and should not be arranged like this.

;

;The report said: In a certain boarding school, more than a hundred students called 12345 at the same time to report that the school ended too late. In response to such reports, the school tried giving Friday afternoons off, but parent dissatisfaction immediately came back. They received reports from parents one after another from 12345 and the mayor’s mailbox: The school did not have classes in the afternoon. What kind of handling method caused the school to suffer back-and-forth attacks from parents and students? I'm afraid it's not just a problem between parents and students.

;

;Therefore, it is necessary to solve the problem of massive unreasonable complaints from parents and students against the school, to eliminate the "preparation and hostility" and distrust that pervades the home-school relationship, and to prevent teachers and schools from "giving up" because of this. "The key to "putting down the problem" and "laying it down" is to re-establish the boundaries of rights between home and school, so that family education and school education can return to their respective places, and no longer make parents tired by assigning various non-educational tasks to parents through schools and teachers. If you can't cope with it, don't treat your children as fat sheep and try to make money from them.

;

;On this basis, when 12345 faces complaints with the education authorities, it should adhere to principles, reason, and right from wrong. It should not force teachers to prove their innocence, not give in to bad parents, and establish decent values. Stimulate the good in human nature and restrain the evil in human nature. Only in this way can schools carry out educational activities normally and pass on good values ​​to children. Our children can continue to improve in knowledge, morality and values, and inspire and demonstrate their conscience and talents.

;I have been living in Chengdu for twenty-five years. I keep moving along the Jinjiang River, as if in the fog. I stop and go like a boat, not knowing where my heart is at home. Inadvertently, it moved from the original downstream to the current upstream. It was not until it was close to Huanhua Creek and adjacent to Du Fu's Thatched Cottage that the fog seemed to gradually dissipate.

;

;Yes, in the past twenty-five years, Jinjiang has been the pillow that accompanies me to sleep every night. I didn’t realize it because it was so familiar. Just in June 2022, when I was able to calm down and look at Jinjiang again, I suddenly discovered that every time I moved before, it was a coincidence that the direction of my door overlapped with my sleeping posture many times, either facing Jinjiang or with my back to Jinjiang. , actually completely consistent. It turns out that all my uneasiness over the years was nothing more than impulsiveness, tossing and stubbornness when I was tossing and turning. The so-called conflict between survival and the so-called poetry and the distance was resolved tonight at the "Hejiang Pavilion" at the intersection of Fuhe and Nanhe, collectively known as Jinjiang River.

;

;Jinjiang, which used to be exclusive to Nanhe River, now also includes Fuhe River. Jinjiang River, whether it is the Nanhe section or the Fuhe section, except for spring tides and summer floods, rarely sees real rapids, and most of the time it always passes through the urban area of ​​Chengdu casually.

;

;This time I followed the famous literary group organized by the Jinjiang District Federation of Literary and Art Circles to revisit Jinjiang, from the December City Museum to the Shuijingfang Museum, and then from Hejiang Pavilion to Dongmen Market and Li Jieren’s former residence on the banks of the Shah River. Walking along both sides of the Jinjiang River, I discovered that it actually has many faces.

;

;;

;

;Wangjiang Tower on the South Bank of Jinjiang River;(Visual China/Picture);

;

;Moving like a dragon< /h4>;

;Rapid, turbulent, moving like a dragon, it should be the first face of Jinjiang.

;

;Tracing back to my fate with Jinjiang, I first read Du Fu’s poem in “Spring Night Rain” when I was in elementary school: “The clouds are all dark on the wild paths, but the fire on the river boats is only bright. At dawn, I can see the red and wet The place is full of flowers." But I didn't know at that time which river the "river boat" in the poem was. I grew up on the banks of the Jialing River. Every time I saw a wooden boat passing by the fast-moving Jialing River, I wanted to get on the boat immediately and rush to this "river boat" river written by Du Fu. I wanted to see if it could Also has a turbulent character. In 1997, I came to Chengdu to go to college. I saw the evergreen Du Fu Thatched Cottage by the Huanhua River and read more of Du Fu's Chengdu poems. Only then did I realize that this river that has been rippling in Chengdu for thousands of years was originally called Jinjiang. Today's scholars and old Chengdu people often regard Huanhua Creek as the starting point of Jinjiang River, but in Du Fu's eyes, the source of Jinjiang River is at the foot of Yulei Mountain in Dujiangyan. Therefore, he said in another poem "Climbing the Tower", "Jinjiang River The spring scenery comes to heaven and earth, and the jade barrier and floating clouds change the past and present." The water cultural gene of Jinjiang comes from the Minjiang River, which moves like a dragon at the foot of Yulei Mountain.

;

;I have traveled to Yulei Mountain many times and experienced firsthand the source of the Jinjiang River. The surging Minjiang River is in Dujiangyan. The majestic Puyang River flows out of the Baopingkou not far from the foot of Yulei Mountain. , the river is most unrestrained when it flows through the Dujiangyan South Bridge. From a distance, you can hear the sound of the raging waves hitting each other and violently beating the earth and rocks on both sides. After passing the South Bridge, near the "Tianfuyuan", the Puyang River split into two, with a Zouma River sloping out from the side. Soon it split into two again, and a cypress river was cut out like a branch, and the Minjiang River flowed straight down. So far, the Zouma River and Baitiao River that branched out have run through the Chengdu Plain, nurturing the people of Shu and achieving the reputation of a land of abundance.

;

;Diverting the surging Minjiang River water to irrigate the Chengdu Plain, this huge credit certainly belongs to Li Bing, the prefect of Shu County during the reign of King Qin Zhao, who presided over the construction of the Dujiangyan Irrigation Project. When he governed Shu, he first controlled the floods, which solved the survival concerns of the people in Shu during the Qin Dynasty. He also paved the way for Chengdu to become one of the most prosperous industrial and commercial cities in the country during the Tang Dynasty.

;

;;

;

;Source of Jinjiang River: Minjiang River at the foot of Yulei Mountain in Dujiangyan;(Peng Zhiqiang/Photo);

;

;Jing Like a Virgin

;

;Calm, elegant, and as quiet as a lady, this is Jin Jiang’s second face.

;

;Among the many sub-rivers of the Minjiang River, the Zouma River, especially the Huanhua Creek where the lower reaches of the Zouma River and the upper reaches of the Jinjiang River are located, are undoubtedly the clearest. Anyone who stops here will be impressed, not least because Huanhua Creek and its 600-acre Huanhua Creek Park have now become the largest green lung in Chengdu. The internal reason is closely related to the poem "washing" in the past dynasties. Especially after Du Fu settled here, Jinjiang gradually evolved into a river of poetry, with clear words and beautiful sentences constantly polishing its body.

;

;The mighty Minjiang River has passed through the outer city in the west of Chengdu since ancient times and flowed near Du Fu Thatched Cottage, but its eager temper has created a gentle Huanhua Creek. No wonder Du Fu chose this place at the first sight when he came to Chengdu. In his poem "Bu Ju", he praised "at the west end of the Huanhua Stream, the owner is Bulintangyou". Later, due to the war in Chengdu, Du Fu, who had to flee the chaos in Zizhou ; (now Santai County, Sichuan);, was still writing "Post a Question" "Jiangwai Thatched Cottage" explains the original intention of settling by the Huanhua Stream, which is: "I have a wild nature, and I want to escape from nature. I am addicted to wine and love bamboos, and I must live in the forest and springs." Today, by the Huanhua Stream, the Mian bamboos are slender, and the loving bamboos are kind. , bamboo cages are everywhere, and it is quiet everywhere. Being among them makes you forget your worries. As the upper reaches of Jinjiang River, Huanhua Creek has an ecological aesthetic quality. "Fish come out in the drizzle, and swallows slant in the breeze." These natural beauties described by Du Fu in the Tang Dynasty can still be experienced frequently today.

;

;In the Tang Dynasty, if you took the waterway, you could take a boat from Huanhua River and turn into the Yangtze River to reach the south of the Yangtze River. Yes, it's Jiangnan. In his youth, Du Fu traveled to Nanjing, Suzhou, Hangzhou, Shaoxing and other ancient places of Wu and Yue. He has never forgotten the landscape of Jiangnan, such as the Qinhuai River in the sound of oars and the Cao'e River under the awning boat. As the saying goes, "Missing" "Wu Sheng Shi Fan" ; (Part 2 of "Two Poems on Zizhou Climbing the Tower in Spring");, I often feel that "the Yan River is beautiful and unique, You can’t forget it if you want to stop”;("The Grand Tour");. Even when he came to settle in such an elegant and peaceful Huanhua River, and decided to live here forever, Du Fu would still think about it from time to time, except in the last sentence of "Bu Ju", "Thousands of miles eastward to enjoy the pleasure, one must go to the mountain shade in a small boat", In the last sentence of "Quequatrains", "The window contains the snow of Qianqiu in the Xiling Mountains, and the door is docked with ships thousands of miles away from Dongwu", I recall the Wuyue landscape rooted deep in my brain.

;

;In fact, the mountains and rivers of Wuyue and Bashan and Shu are the sources of Du Fu’s landscape poetry. In particular, the Jinjiang River in Chengdu and the Yangtze River in Chongqing also helped Du Fu reach the pinnacle of Chinese five-rhythm and seven-rhythm poetry, such as his famous five-rhythm poem "Spring Night Joyful Rain", "Look at the red and wet places at dawn, and the flowers are heavy in Jinguancheng", and his seven-rhythm poem. The famous poem "Ascend the High" "The endless falling trees rustle down, and the endless Yangtze River rolls in". And as soon as he left Chengdu, Huanhua Creek became the most beautiful Jinjiang that Du Fu never forgot in Kuizhou ; (today's Fengjie County, Chongqing); on the Yangtze River. , for example, in "Two Poems on Huaijin Water", one of them says, "The water of Wu Gorge is coming towards Wu Gorge, and the waves of Jinjiang River are far away." Another example is that in "Five Poems of Generals," the fifth one also says, "The spring beauty of Jinjiang River drives people to Wu Gorge." Qingqiu mourns thousands of people."

;

;"Since ancient times, I have been traveling in captivity, why should I be sad?" ;("Chengdu Mansion"); made Du Fu let go for a time Ji Lv is sad, thanks to Chengdu and Huanhua Creek in Chengdu. Chengdu and Jinjiang also have to thank Du Fu for his poetic talent of "not surprising even if his words are not surprising". All this is, of course, because the sparkling Huanhua Creek provided Du Fu with a stable habitat. In the spring of 760, Du Fu was very satisfied with the thatched hut built by Huanhua Stream. He immediately wrote a poem "Tangcheng": "The back of the Guotang is shaded by white grass, and the road along the edge of the river overlooks the green suburbs. The alder forest blocks the sun and sings in the wind. Leaves, bamboo cages and smoke dripping from the dew tips. The flying crows will stop to count their eggs, and the swallows will come frequently to make new nests. Others mistakenly compare Yang Xiong's house, and he is lazy and has no intention of making fun of it." Since childhood, Du Fu said that he had a talent similar to Yang Xiong's. His talent and poetic talent were no less than those of Cao Zhi. Suddenly someone mistook his thatched cottage for Yang Xiong's old residence. What else needed to be explained? From then on, in addition to traveling to other places, he basically spent time on the riverside looking for flowers, asking for willows, meeting friends, drinking, farming, and growing medicine. He kept looking at Jinjiang from various perspectives and copying it. From the time I arrived in Chengdu in the winter of 759, I felt uncomfortable writing "Chengdu Mansion" because of "the bustling city, playing the flute and the sheng". By the time I left Chengdu in the summer of 765, I wrote "Go to Shu" with tears in my eyes. ”, Du Fu wrote more than 200 poems during the 6 years he lived here. Almost every poem will be poetically inspired by Jinjiang. He wrote this repeatedly, and on the day he left, he finally turned Jinjiang into a river of poetry.

;

;;

;

;The upper reaches of Jinjiang River: Huanhua Creek;(Peng Zhiqiang/Photo);

;

;Later, Du Fu’s worship Visitors and followers came from different dynasties one after another, and they were in an endless stream on both sides of the Jinjiang River. The rising and falling sounds of poetry can be heard everywhere. Zhang Ji is here, and his "Chengdu Song" is very lively in Chengdu dialect. The picture is: "The smoke and water are green near the west of Jinjiang River, and the lychees are ripe at the top of the Xinyu Mountain. There are many restaurants near the Wanli Bridge, and tourists love to stay in whoever they want to stay at." Su Shi is here, After struggling in officialdom for many years, he was demoted to Huangzhou. His memories of Jinjiang are full of nostalgia, such as in "The Red River: Sent to Ezhou Zhu Envoy Jun Shouchang": "Coming west from Jianghan, the grapes under the tall buildings are deep green. I still bring them with me. Min'e snow waves, the spring scenery of Jinjiang. You are the beloved guardian of Nanshan, and I miss the return guest outside the sword." Lu You came. He loved Jinjiang, especially the plum blossoms on both sides of Jinjiang. It can be said that "Ten years of horse racing along the Jinjiang River". For ten years, he was "on Jinjiang Road in front of Qingyang Palace, and I was drunk by plum blossoms for ten years." In his later years, the lingering aftertaste is still: "Back then, when I walked to the west of Jincheng, I was drunk by plum blossoms. For twenty miles, the fragrance continued. , Qingyang Palace to Huanhua Stream."

;

;Jinjiang starts from the intersection of Huanhua Stream and Modi River in the northeast of Caotang Primary School, all the way from west to east, passing Baihuatan, Jinguan Bridge, Rainbow Bridge, Wanli Bridge to Hejiang Pavilion, this section of the river is also called Nanhe. This is the only river that Du Fu must pass when leaving Chengdu in his later years, and it is also the spring river that Li Bai sang on the Sanhua Tower in his youth "Building" "Evening rain goes to the Three Gorges, and the Spring River flows around the two streams");, during which time, we go retrograde from the Sanhua Building in Baihua Pond to the Shuangxian Bridge Antique Market on the bank of Huanhua Creek. There are also Yuxian Bridge, Wangxian Bridge, and Wangxian Bridge. Send Xianqiao. The Nanhe River starting from Huanhua Stream winds and meanders without any rush until it meets the Fuhe River running from north to south at Hejiang Pavilion. At the confluence of the two rivers, waves suddenly bloom, gradually returning to their turbulent nature originating from the Minjiang River. From there, he quickly rushed to Jiuyan Bridge, Wangjiang Tower, and Huanglong River, and returned to the mainstream of the Minjiang River near the Jiangkou Chenyin Site in Pengshan, Meishan, and went straight into the Yangtze River.

;

;My inspection of Jinjiang this time came along the Fuhe River with a group, and then I went back home alone from the Nanhe River. Although I have witnessed the spectacular confluence of the Nanhe River and the Fuhe River many times before, they are still there. The scene of hugging each other and recognizing relatives in Hejiang Pavilion is still seen often. It made me get to know Jinjiang and myself again. It seemed casual but in fact I was very committed to the original intention of living in Jinjiang.

;

;;

;

;锦江南河段;（彭志强/图）;

;

;锦若蜀锦

;

;惊艳，而包容，前程似锦，则是锦江的第三张面孔。

;

;先回溯岷江支流柏条河的行踪，其实它跟走马河一样也是一路向东，在成都城北多次分流，子河有毗河、东风渠、沙河、府河，其中，府河由北转东再往南注入成都城。相比走马河，柏条河的使命更大，特别是在唐代，它从成都府城下经过，成为护城河，护佑成都风调雨顺，守护成都繁华千年。流经、守护成都府城这段柏条河，故名府河。李白在《上皇西巡南京歌十首》其七就说了，唐代这条护城河是“锦水东流绕锦城，星桥北挂象天星”。这条虽多次改道却仍在守护成都的护城河，就是如今在合江亭与南河交汇的府河。没错，府河被李白视为“锦水”，原先专指锦江的南河又是杜甫眼里的“锦水”，如其《短歌行赠王郎司直》便说“西得诸侯棹锦水，欲向何门趿珠履”。

;

;府河与南河，这两处绕城“锦水”，曾被统称为府南河，是成都人口中滔滔不绝的母亲河。同源于岷江的府河与南河，皆是“锦水”，既然已统称府南河了，为何不都叫“锦江”呢？锦江，顾名思义，就是一条前程似锦的江。 2005年，经四川省政府批准，成都市区段的府河、南河正式统称为锦江。毕竟，流经、护佑、兴旺成都，府河与南河都出了大力。

;

;再说锦江的另一个重要文化来源：蜀锦。成都的建城史，从秦国吞并蜀国后的张仪筑城，到如今已有两千三百多年。自李冰引岷江进入成都平原，不断更改入城河道的成都，从秦代开始就如蓄水一样蓄力。这力，就是蜀锦带给成都经济繁荣的动力。其实，养蚕，织锦，自古便是蜀地先民的生活习俗，到了织锦业发达的西汉，成都生产的蜀锦又因技艺精湛、花色甚多、用途很广，行销全国，名扬天下。 2012年，在成都老官山汉墓考古发掘出土的四部蜀锦提花织机模型，它们的年代都指向西汉，既是迄今我国发现最完整的西汉时期织机模型，也是迄今为止世界上最早的提花机模型。

;

;相传早在汉代，朝廷便在成都设置了专职管理织锦的官员，命名为“锦官”，到三国蜀汉时，丞相诸葛亮又恢复“锦官”，一举解决战乱时期的蜀国经济和军费开支的问题，成都因此新增了“锦官城”和“锦城”的美名。杜甫旅居成都时期，所写《蜀相》“丞相祠堂何处寻，锦官城外柏森森”、《春夜喜雨》“晓看红湿处，花重锦官城”，说明唐时的锦官城遗址尚在，其官署大约就在彩虹桥与万里桥之间的锦江边。在唐代，旧称蜀郡、益州的成都，因蜀锦等手工业得到极大发展，加上岷江哺育的成都平原盛产稻米等五谷杂粮，一跃成为比长安、洛阳两京还要繁荣的城市，史称“扬一益二”，就是说成都的经济能量仅次于素有鱼米之乡和运河要冲的扬州。

;

;我说锦江惊艳如蜀锦，是因它真被蜀锦洗亮过。据刘禹锡《浪淘沙九首》其五记载：“濯锦江边两岸花，春风吹浪正淘沙。女郎剪下鸳鸯锦，将向中流定晚霞。”诗中，刘禹锡生动地描写了一个唐代成都女子在锦江浣洗蜀锦的画面。还有李白，即使是在浔阳被判长流夜郎徒刑，他也很惦念成都被蜀锦浣洗过的锦江，其《上皇西巡南京歌十首》其六就说“濯锦清江万里流，云帆龙舸下扬州”。在唐代，锦江河道宽阔，奔腾万里，豪气十足，为何却要在“锦江”之前加个“濯”字？就因锦江又名濯锦江、濯锦之江。濯锦，锦彩鲜润逾于常，故名。在锦江边浣洗蜀锦，并非始于唐代，大约从西汉起，蜀人就爱把纺织剪裁的蜀锦放入浣花溪浣洗，后人将此美其名曰“濯锦”。

;

;常住锦江上游浣花溪的杜甫，怎会不知“濯锦江”传说，其《萧八明府实处觅桃栽》“河阳县里虽无数，濯锦江边未满园”，就曾交代，安史之乱期间的浣花溪比较缺乏桃树，于是找了萧八明府觅来新桃栽种。杜甫初到成都时，主要以务农、种药为生，一家人又经常靠高适、严武等友人的禄米救济，当他在成都出任剑南西川节度参谋、检校工部员外郎后，想必也是一身锦衣，经常放入锦江濯洗。

;

;用蜀锦濯洗锦江，在当今的最大传承，恐怕是以锦江命名为一个县级区了。 1990年，成都撤销东城区，以其主体部分改置锦江区，区名正是来源于李白、杜甫、刘禹锡等大诗人诗句里口口相传千年的“濯锦江”这一蜀地文化。在秦代，锦江区所在地叫成都县，它此时已是蜀郡的核心城区。在唐代，成都县不论改名为蜀县还是华阳县，它仍是成都府;（安史之乱后的大唐首都“南京”）;的核心城区。

;

;;

;

;锦江上的安顺廊桥;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;锦江，从岷江奔流而来濯洗成都城的“濯锦江”，它不仅孵化了锦江区，还从锦江区的合江亭一路向南注入高新区、双流区、天府新区，持续扩张成都的动脉。即使如我，这样一个长达二十五年的“蓉漂”，能在锦江府河段立业，又在锦江南河段安家，可以说，先是受杜甫的诗意锦江感召，最终也是拜经济腾飞的锦江所赐。

;

;夏日的傍晚，彩霞烧红了成都上空的脸庞，也映红了穿城而过的锦江。夜幕渐次拉开，华灯初上，沿着锦江边的合江亭漫步，返回上游的浣花溪，夜深枕着蜀锦靠枕入梦，我想，我的余生再也无法远离锦江了。

;

; Fri, 06 Oct 2023 22:25:04 +0800 走出村小的学生正在服务杭州亚运，让我看到教育的意义http://www.infzm.com/contents/258148
;;2023-10-06 21:30:00;
;

;The Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day holiday will give you a few days to spare. While watching the replay video of the opening ceremony of the Hangzhou Asian Games, I remembered that Xiao Yang, who I had been in contact with before and was now in Hangzhou, might be serving the Asian Games as a volunteer at this time.

;

;I immediately sent her a message, but it took a few hours for me to receive her reply: She was on rest during service, not in the library, but still busy... Finally, while she was resting During the break, I learned that she was working with several other volunteers this time to provide information consultation for athletes in the e-sports stadium, issue game passes, arrange for athletes to enter the lounge, and check-in matters.

;

;Looking at some of the live pictures and work photos of the e-sports stadium that she posted on her WeChat Moments, the more I looked at them carefully, the less I could recall too many scenes of her as a primary school student.

;

;She was the first group of students I taught when I became a teacher ten years ago. At that time, compared with other students in the class, she was not necessarily very cheerful and lively, but she was serious, studious, and careful enough. She was selected as a "study committee member" very early. She lived right across from the school. Sometimes she would finish her homework in the classroom after school and then go home. She would also occasionally come to the school after dinner to chat with me and another young teacher who lived in the school. Although her grades in elementary school have always been among the best, even though she occasionally sent me holiday greetings after entering junior high school, and even though she heard my opinions when she filled in her application for the college entrance examination, I never imagined that the person who read the text aloud ten years ago A student who was not very loud and did not perform actively in public classes can now use fluent English to help e-sports players from different countries successfully enter the arena and complete the game and win their praise.

;

;What makes me even more moved is that the starting point for her volunteer service for the Asian Games was an extremely ordinary rural primary school, a primary school with less than 300 people, a sports ground on dirt... A student can pass After ten years of study and continuous hard work, I entered the city, entered the university, and entered the Asian Games e-sports stadium with a sense of technology and modernity. I used my enthusiasm and professional ability to contribute to the Asian Games. I have always been in a township school. In my opinion, it is simply a miracle.

;

;I am not sure whether Xiao Yang could have imagined that he would have such a special situation when he was in elementary school ten years ago, high school five years ago, and college two years ago. But for me, a teacher who has taught her for two years, witnessed her growth, and followed her learning, there are too many surprises and too many gratifications. This surprise and relief was the result of seeing her continue to learn and receive education. It was so beautiful and good. Even the whole process and results were something that neither she nor I, who had experienced it, had ever imagined or expected.

;

;In my tenth year of teaching, many of my students have already entered the workplace early, some are still studying on university campuses, some are still preparing for the college entrance examination, and some have just entered junior high school. Whenever I wonder how much positive role I, as their teacher, have played in their growth and learning, Xiao Yang’s experience in serving the Asian Games should be the best answer I can give at the moment.

;

;(The author is a teacher in Suixian County, Suizhou City, Hubei Province)

;

;;

;

;;(Xiaochen 4x/Picture );

;

;I was born in Liling, Hunan. Since I left when I was very young, I have always regarded Pingxiang, Jiangxi, as my hometown. When I first heard that the capital of Anhui Province was called "Hefei", I was as surprised as I was when I learned about the history of Pingxiang. Although this coal city in western Jiangxi is called "Pingxiang", in fact, it has become a well-known industrial and mining city at home and abroad as early as the late Qing Dynasty with the rise of Anyuan Coal Mine; it is not only the birthplace of the Chinese workers' movement, but also the autumn harvest. Why was the origin of the uprising named "Pingxiang"?

;

;Isn’t it just Pingxiang? There are also many cities in China with interesting names. For example, the capital of Hebei Province is called "Shijiazhuang" and the famous porcelain capital of Jiangxi is called "Jingdezhen". In the 1970s, a flood in the upper reaches of the Huaihe River washed out Henan Province. A prefecture-level city was named "Zhumadian".

;

;It is either a town, a village, or a store. It is conceivable that most of these place names come from its history. But the combination of these two Chinese characters "Hefei" makes people feel strange. A cross talk once joked that it was "two fat men sleeping". Later I learned that it got its name because it is located where the two Fei rivers in the north and south merge into Chaohu Lake.

;

;The first time I went to Anhui, or the first time to Hefei, was in May of 1993, when the flowers were blooming. At that time, I was still working in Pingxiang City. The two places were separated by more than a thousand kilometers. Because of the inconvenient transportation, Hefei felt like a distant existence.

;

;I spent two full days on that trip.

;

;I set off early in the morning the day before. After taking the green train for most of the day, I first arrived in Nanchang and stayed at a small hotel near the long-distance bus station. The next day, I took a bus before dawn. Genius 1 bus bound for Hefei. Then, the car passed through countless villages and towns. The road was uneven and had potholes from time to time. After a day of bumps, the bones were falling apart. Lunch seemed to have been served at a roadside shop in Huangmei County, Hubei Province. It was probably the driver's personal designated restaurant. The food didn't look clean, and there was a strange taste in the mouth. This is nothing, the worst part is going to the "bathroom". Although the car stopped twice during the journey, both times it stopped in the wilderness of Qianbuba Village and Hoububa Store; those two places were blocked. The sheds called "public restrooms" were only one person high and had no doors. The passengers were self-conscious at first and lined up at a distance, but the male compatriots who couldn't wait went to look for trees or grass that could provide shelter. To solve the problem, our female compatriots could only guard the toilet. The dirty floor in the toilet and the flying mosquitoes and flies made me retching uncontrollably.

;

;In order not to go to the toilet, I didn’t dare to drink a sip of water or take a sip of food along the way. By the time I arrived in Hefei, it was already dark and I was so hungry that my chest was touching my back.

;

;After that terrible experience, I did not dare to return to my hometown. It was not until three years later that a railway was built between Hefei and Nanchang, and I began to return to my hometown.

;

;At first, this special line was not included in the national railway system and was only a local railway between Anhui and Jiangxi provinces. It starts from Hefei's West Railway Station, passes through Feixi, Lujiang, Shucheng, Tongcheng, Qianshan, Susong, and Wangjiang in Anhui Province, passes through Huangmei in Hubei Province, and then crosses the Yangtze River and enters Jiujiang and Yongxiu in Jiangxi Province. , and finally arrived in Nanchang.

;

;I do remember that the first time I boarded that southbound train was one morning at the end of 1996. At that time, our financial situation was still very difficult, and all we bought was a seat ticket. When my husband and I got into the car carrying large and small bags, we were surprised to find that there were very few passengers in the car. Although some people started to get on along the way, they were always sparse and there were so many empty spots that people could even lie down and sleep. Looking out the window at the rolling mountains, the sleeping fields under the winter sun, and the fleeting simple farmhouses, I felt mixed feelings. Fortunately, I no longer have to endure the pain of long-distance buses where I dare not even take a sip of water. Switching to a spacious and comfortable train, the time is shortened by nearly half. What is worrying is that there are too few passengers and the passenger flow is so small. Volume, let alone making money, whether the cost can be maintained is a question, and the economies of Anhui and Jiangxi provinces are still underdeveloped. If they are always losing money, can this train be saved?

;

;This train arrived at the terminal, Nanchang, in the evening. Since there were no more trains to Pingxiang that day, we had to stay in Nanchang for one night. I remember we chose a hotel called "Da Guangming" on Zhanqian Road. "Da Guangming" is a small hotel. The rooms are poorly furnished and there is no separate bathroom. A very funny thing happened in "Great Light" that day, and even today, twenty-six years later, I still remember it fresh.

;

;While packing the luggage the next morning, my husband suddenly discovered that an envelope containing 3,000 yuan in cash was missing! The door was locked and the windows were bolted, so it was impossible for outsiders to come in and steal. But after searching every corner of the room, as well as the corridors and public toilets outside, nothing was found. My husband then went downstairs to find the waiter, and soon a hotel security guard came up. He said that only the two of us lived on the entire floor that day, and even if it fell on the corridor, it would not be picked up by anyone. What he meant was that the envelope could only be left in the room. So, in front of him, I took off the quilt cover, lifted the sheets, took out the items in the box one by one, and rummaged through them again, but there was still nothing. At this time, my husband made a request to him, "Maybe I accidentally dropped it into the toilet when I was convenient and it was washed away. Can you take me to the sewer to have a look?" The man did not refuse. He agreed, "It is possible. Not long ago, a traveler dropped a watch and found it in the sewer. There were not many people staying in the hotel last night, and the water from the sewer should still be accumulated downstairs. I will take you Go down and look for it."

;

;With a glimmer of hope, we followed him downstairs. He took out an iron rod with a hook from a corner, led us around to the small courtyard behind the hotel, and opened two The iron plate, underneath is the sewer. He bent over and rolled up his sleeves, completely ignoring the stench coming from the sewer. He held the iron rod and carefully raked it back and forth little by little. After raking it out three or four times, he still found nothing. He smiled at us apologetically: "Nothing either!"

;

;If I really can’t find it, I can only admit that I am unlucky. We left "Da Guangming" sadly, took the train back to Pingxiang, and stayed at Dadi's house at night.

;

;That year, my eldest brother was allocated a new apartment. This money was originally a gift to him, but unexpectedly something unexpected happened, so he had to owe it first. Unexpectedly, when my husband went to bed at night, he took off the black woolen jacket and something fell from his sleeve, and it was not the envelope containing the money!

;

;As for how the envelope slipped into the sleeves, there is no way to verify it; he didn’t even notice it when he was getting dressed, and he didn’t even notice when he put it all the way around, which shows that he doesn’t care about such trivial matters in life. He is a careless person.

;

;While I was blaming his Madaha for giving me a false alarm, I was also full of guilt for the Da Guangming Hotel. Think about it, in the middle of winter, I had to dig out the gutter early in the morning, and I still looked unhappy when I left. I always thought that the money was lost in the hotel, and I even suspected that the waiter had picked it up!

;

;Since then, the Daguangming Hotel and the tall security guard have been deeply engraved in my mind. Even after our economic conditions improved, I still chose to stay in "Da Guangming" every time I was in transit from Nanchang. Once, my son had a high fever in the middle of the night, but I did not panic and gave him medicine calmly because I believed that this hotel would definitely lend a helping hand if needed.

;

;A few years later, this Anhui-Jiangxi line was integrated into the national railway network. The trains from Hefei to Nanchang were also extended from Nanchang to Guangzhou, and a pair of trains to Dongguan were also added. There are many trains to choose from, but both trains depart from Hefei at noon or evening, and arrive in Nanchang either in the evening or in the middle of the night; and the train from Nanchang to Hefei departs in the early morning, either in the middle of the night or in the early morning. When traveling between Hefei and my hometown, I still have to stay one night in Nanchang. I have been riding this kind of train for more than ten years, so I have stayed at the Daguangming Hotel no less than forty times.

;

;Although I don’t have a good impression of Nanchang Railway Station. Every time I leave the station, there will be a number of people holding signs to solicit guests to stay in the hotel, and they will keep pestering you; in front of the station When dining in a small restaurant, if you don't agree on the price in advance, sometimes you will be charged an exorbitant price, and you will have to consider yourself unlucky if you get ripped off, because those people are very rude and seem to be ready to use their fists at any time. Fortunately, this hotel prevented us from being too disappointed in this city.

;

;About 2010, my journey back home changed again: Hefei opened two direct trains to the southwest, one to Kunming and one to Nanning; Both trains pass through my hometown. The former departs in the morning and arrives in the evening, while the latter departs in the morning and arrives in the evening. The time it takes to reach Pingxiang does not exceed twelve hours. From then on, my journey back to my hometown suddenly became very smooth. I no longer needed to change trains midway. I only had to buy a sleeper ticket, get on the train from Hefei after dinner, and sleep all the way to Pingxiang in time for breakfast the next day; or I was still in Hefei in the morning, and before the sun went down, I came to the streets of Pingxiang.

;

;With the convenient transportation, the number of times I return to my hometown has naturally increased. It used to be once or twice a year, but now it has become several times. Something happened at home. I got a call the day before and I arrived early the next morning. It used to be difficult to meet my classmates and friends from my hometown, but now it is easy to meet once or twice a year. Whenever there is a school anniversary or class celebration event, as long as I can spare the time, I will rush back to join in the fun. , although I have been away from home for more than 20 years, my former classmates and friends have miraculously recovered.

;

;This Spring Festival, my husband and I went back to our hometown to visit my mother. When we purchased tickets online, we unexpectedly discovered that the train from Hefei to Kunming suddenly disappeared; the train to Nanning was also absent. Pingxiang stopped. But at the same time, I was even more surprised to find that there is a high-speed rail connection between Hefei and Nanchang! Moreover, the high-speed rail departs six times a day, and the whole journey takes just over two hours! Then, I also discovered that the passenger train that used to operate between Anhui and Jiangxi had also returned, but it had also changed from the earlier green train to a motor train, and the time was greatly shortened to two hours and forty minutes!

;

;At around 12 noon on the fifth day of the Lunar New Year, my husband and I boarded the train. Looking at the wilderness and farmhouses passing by outside the window, my mood suddenly returned to the unstoppable excitement I felt when I first took the train back to my hometown twenty-six years ago. In my impression, the speed of the green train at that time was only 60 kilometers per hour, and in order to prevent thermal expansion and contraction, there were gaps at the joints of each section of the rail. When the wheels passed by, a clear and audible "thumping thump" would be emitted from underneath the train. The sound of "thump, thump, thump" is especially loud when people are quiet at night; and now the speed of high-speed trains has reached more than 200 kilometers per hour. People sitting on the train can no longer hear the sound of wheels hitting the rails. It is so smooth that even the water in the cup can't be heard. It didn't move at all. As you can imagine, the rails today are obviously seamless. There are only twenty-six years before and after. Twenty-six years is not a long time, but it is enough to give birth to a generation. It is only a blink of an eye. In the past twenty-six years, China's railway transportation has indeed undergone earth-shaking changes. . In terms of speed alone, there used to be only local trains or express trains, but at the beginning of the 20th century, there were express trains and direct trains. By the 2008 Olympic Games, the first intercity high-speed rail line appeared between Beijing and Tianjin. The municipalities have implemented high-speed rail and public transportation, and it only takes half an hour to travel to and from each other. In terms of color, in the past, local trains were always green, while in the transition to express trains, there were red and blue. Later, high-speed trains and high-speed trains were all white. Now, high-speed trains have spread all over the country, and only Anhui Province has done so. Arrive at Shishitong High Speed ​​Rail. So, I discovered that the colors of the cars have been adjusted again: except for the high-speed trains, all ordinary passenger cars have returned to the previous green color.

;

;Green is the color of spring, which makes you feel refreshed and full of vitality. Of course, the bigger change is that today's rail transit has switched from burning coal to using electricity. This is a change of the times. It has not only become faster, but also cleaner and more environmentally friendly! So, I am guessing what kind of new energy will be used to drive high-speed rail and high-speed trains in the future?

;

;I searched on the Internet with great interest and found out that the high-speed railway between Nanchang and Hefei was officially opened to traffic this year, that is, in January 2022. I was earlier. One of the passengers who enjoys this benefit. There were not many passengers on the train that day. Just like the first time I took the local railway, most of the seats were empty. But I no longer have the worries I had back then, because the reason why there are so few passengers this time is not due to passenger volume, but due to the COVID-19 epidemic. Everyone is responding to the government’s call and trying not to travel if possible.

;

;High-speed rail not only greatly shortens the time compared to ordinary trains, but the convenience of transfer is also a major advantage. I have transferred at Tianjin West Railway Station in a municipality directly under the Central Government, and at Bengbu South Railway Station in a prefecture-level city. Both times I could transfer without leaving the station. This time, the train entered Nanchang West Station. We got off the train and followed the "Convenient Transfer" signs to get on the elevator of the station's overpass. We crossed the overpass and entered the waiting room directly. Because there are as many as 26 high-speed trains running from Nanchang West to Pingxiang North every day, we only stayed at the station for a short time and completed the transfer easily. An hour later, we ended our journey back to our hometown.

;

;Thinking about it, all this is incredible: from Hefei, between the Jianghuai River and the Huaihe River, to Pingxiang, the coal capital of western Jiangxi, the trip used to take two days and one night, but now it only takes four hours. Such speed was something I couldn't even dream of before. Many people have watched "Water Margin" and know that Dai Zong, the magical Taibo in it, can travel a thousand miles in a day and eight hundred miles at night. Everyone thinks that is just a myth. But with China's high-speed rail now, why does it take one day to travel a thousand miles? Two or three hours is enough!

;

;Nowadays, the journey back to my hometown can be said to be a kind of enjoyment.

;

;The classic image that has been widely circulated at the Nanyang Midi Music Festival: lifting a wheelchair man. The picture comes from the official Weibo of the Midi Music Festival

;

;After witnessing the two classic scenes of "Mud Fight" and "Lifting a Wheelchair Brother", Liu Rui could have brought this exclusive experience of the Midi Music Festival with him Looking back, I ended my annual music pilgrimage with joy, but I didn't expect that an unexpected theft incident at the last moment destroyed almost all the "beautiful things in this world".

;

;This senior music fan, like many of his friends, has had a habit of going to music festivals during the National Day holiday for many years, but none of his previous experiences were as exciting as this one in Nanyang, Henan. Unforgettable: "I have heard of things being thrown away at music festivals before, but it was not as serious as this time. This time it is too exaggerated."

;

;During the National Day holiday, "Central Plains Midi" in Nanyang, Henan "Music Festival" has been on the hot search topic list many times. Among them, according to reports from many music fans on social platforms, a large-scale property theft occurred in the Midi camping area on October 3. Videos and pictures provided by music fans showed that local villagers broke into the Midi camp and brazenly "ransacked" tents. , many computers, mobile phones, musical instruments and other valuables were confiscated. "It's outrageous that my home has been moved away after I went to the bathroom. It was already an open robbery." A music fan told a reporter from Southern Weekend.

;

;On October 5, a reporter from Southern Weekend called the Nanyang Municipal Public Security Bureau. A police officer surnamed Lu responded: "We are still registering the lost items of music fans. The specific situation needs to be contacted by the Municipal Public Security Bureau."

;

;On October 5, the official Weibo of the Midi Music Festival announced that the local police received a total of 73 reports and implemented 65 theft cases. After investigation by the public security organs, some thieves have been captured and detained, and some property has been recovered. On the same day, the WeChat public account "Nanyang Radio and Television Station" issued a notice saying that based on the current registration situation of music fans, 79 ID cards and 3 computers have been returned , 17 mobile phones, and the remaining items are being verified and contacted.

;

;Because of the rain, few people live in the camping area

;

;This is the first time Nanyang has hosted the Midi Music Festival, which will be held for four days from September 29th to October 2nd. In order to hold this music festival, the local government opened a large open space in Huangshan Village on the outskirts of the country, planted a large lawn, and named it "Green Field Monologue."

;

;“It rained for three days during the four-day music festival.” Liu Rui said that outdoor music festivals like Midi usually provide open spaces for music fans to bring tents for camping. At noon on September 29, the camping area was officially opened to music fans. However, during the past few days of the music festival, except for the sunny weather on September 30, it continued to rain for the other three days. After setting up their tents, many music fans only use them to rest during the day and choose to stay in hotels in the city and take a shower at night. For the sake of convenience, many people do not carry their luggage with them, but put it directly in the tent as usual.

;

;Liu Rui said that the camping site is divided into three areas: A, B, and C. Among them, Area C where he is stationed is located inside. The theft was not serious. He only lost his power bank, The relatively low-value items such as power strips did not call the police. However, thefts in areas A and B near the exit, especially near the fence, are very serious. "It seems that Shenzhen music fans put their things on the wall and suffered heavy losses."

;

;According to him, he had not heard of any "lost things" in the days before the festival. On the last morning, he returned to After setting up camp, many people found their belongings missing.

;

;“We have a (music fan) organization, and we all camp together.” Wu Siqi is from Shenzhen, and this is her fourth MIDI tour. She recalled to the Southern Weekend reporter that because of the rain, she only stayed in the tent for one night on the second night, and stayed in the hotel the rest of the time. She put her luggage in the tent and zipped it up. On the evening of October 2, I was in a very excited mood after watching the performance and found nothing unusual. When I returned to the camping area from the hotel on October 3, I found that the zipper of the tent had been opened, many belongings were missing, and some items were scattered beside the tent. It was obvious that There are signs of being picked up.

;

;After verification, she lost a mobile phone, several bank cards, some cash, and some souvenirs. "They should have come in by climbing over the wall." Wu Siqi said that music fans can get a bracelet on site after purchasing tickets. There are staff on duty at the entrance, and they can enter and exit freely with the bracelet. "There are people watching the entrance, and the security on the wall inside is poor." She said that the wall at the music festival venue is about two meters high and is not guarded by security guards, making it easier to climb over.

;

;When Wu Siqi communicated with friends from Shenzhen, they all suffered varying degrees of loss. She saw videos and pictures taken by music fans. Some people climbed over the wall and jumped into the camping area, while others were rummaging through tents in the camp.

;

;Music fan Liu Ling lost her laptop, headphones, power bank, and goods used to set up a stall. When she went to the police station to call the police, she met a stall owner who claimed that more than 80,000 yuan worth of goods was missing. In order to find her lost items, she joined three music fan support groups. Each group has four to five hundred people, all of whom said they had lost their belongings.

;

;This is Liu Ling’s first time to participate in a large outdoor music festival. She had not graduated from college yet, so she took the green train from Guangzhou to Nanyang for more than ten hours. "My family doesn't know about this yet. I'm still in school now, and it costs a lot," she said.

;

;;

;

;Another classic scene "Mud Fight". The picture comes from the official Weibo of Midi Music Festival

;

;Multiple suspects have been arrested

;

;After the incident, some netizens posted on social media that during the music festival, someone was broadcasting , once released the information that no one wanted the tents after the music festival, which played a misleading role. In response, the Organizing Committee of the Central Plains Midi Music Festival stated in an announcement on October 5 that on the morning of October 4, netizen Chen illegally posted false information that "the event has ended and the scene must be cleaned up," causing nearby villagers to Taking advantage of the chaos, there were many cases of property being stolen in camping areas. The announcement also revealed that Chen, who published misleading and false information, has been arrested.

;

;“I don’t know what his mentality is, why would he send such a message?” Liu Rui said that on the second and third days of the music festival, he discovered that someone was “picking up” the moisture-proof mat. Within the acceptable range, "I just want to pick up some small advantages." The turning point came on the penultimate night of the show, when items from the tent began to be stolen on a massive scale.

;

;Liu Rui said that he had participated in many music festivals before and had property stolen from time to time. He had even heard of gangs of thieves committing collective crimes, but nothing like this at the Nanyang Midi Music Festival. exaggerate.

;

;"Stealing is stealing. We do believe that a lot of things have been stolen from the entire camp." Wu Siqi said that she saw some netizens on the Internet excusing the villagers, thinking that what happened in Nanyang Midi The disgraceful incident was not considered theft, but the villagers "took" some items abandoned after the event. She believed that this argument completely ignored the facts, "They are just denying the facts, and this is not acceptable."

;

;Wu Siqi said that her trip to Nanyang Midi originally left her with very good memories, but the final encounter ruined these experiences. She said that due to the continuous rain, some music fans' plans to camp outdoors were scrapped. The organizers provided free accommodation for some music fans who could not find a hotel temporarily. They caught a cold after being exposed to the rain. They could also receive free brown sugar at the music festival. Ginger tea. Details including transportation connections and other details are also in place, and the favorability level was once full.

;

;She also had some contact with local residents. When she went to the city for a stroll during the music festival, the citizens she met were very enthusiastic, because it was difficult to take a taxi, and she also encountered well-meaning passengers and drivers who "crash" "Give them a ride." "I felt very warm and moved. As a result, when I returned to the camp on the last day, I found that my house had been robbed and stabbed." Wu Siqi said that the experience of these few days was magical, "It immediately took me back from Utopia. It exposed the reality and made me see the dangers of society."

;

;Zhao Kun is a music fan born in the 1970s. Due to the weather, he has been staying in the hotel, but he still witnessed the final "fantasy" scene. "It feels like the mentality of fellow villagers who steal pumpkins, or overturn the fruit cart on the highway, and grab the fruit." He said that at first, it was just the mentality of taking advantage of it, "picking up" some worthless things, but later people saw that the advantage had been taken away. People picked them up and simply coveted the items in the tent. In the end, the situation intensified and turned into "looting" with open fire.

;

;On October 5, a Southern Weekend reporter called the Midi Music Festival Organizing Committee. A person in charge said that the police have been called and detailed registration work has been done for fans who have lost their belongings. The public security organs have A special work team has also been set up for this collective theft case, and many suspects have been arrested so far. "We compared the recovered items with our registration information at the scene, and have now returned some of the fans' items. We also later learned that one of the netizens, Chen, spread false information on the Internet after the night of the 2nd. The message indicates that the event is over, and no one wants many things. Let everyone pick them up. At present, Chen has been arrested by the public security organs."

;

;Encountering a "Black Swan" in investment promotion

;

;Midi The music festival is an original music festival founded by Beijing Midi Music School. It is a music festival IP with a long history in China and has a deep foundation of music fans. In recent years, Midi Music Festival has frequently moved out of first-tier cities and been held in third- and fourth-tier cities in the mainland, which also has box office appeal. However, the arrival of the Midi Music Festival in Nanyang is an initiative of the Nanyang local government to attract investment and attract traffic.

;

;According to local media reports, in May 2023, leaders of the Wolong District Committee of Nanyang City led a team to Beijing Midi Music School to discuss cooperation. The leaders of the Wolong District Committee said that Wolong District has sufficient development space and activity scenes. , hoping that both parties will promote cooperation, jointly ignite urban vitality, release industrial potential, highlight cultural charm, and inject more young forces into Wolong District's "urban growth". The person in charge of Midi Music School said that Wolong District has a beautiful natural environment and broad prospects for the development of the cultural tourism industry.

;

;On the afternoon of October 2, the person in charge of Beijing Midi Music School said in an interview with Nanyang Daily that this music festival was very successful and set a box office record for the 47th Midi Music Festival in 30 years. , the number of live audiences also broke the previous record. There were more than 20,000 viewers on the eve of the music festival, and the number of viewers was close to 40,000 every day for the other three days. All tickets for the music festival were sold out in advance.

;

;On October 5, Southern Weekend reporters called the Wolong District Culture and Tourism Bureau of Nanyang City. The staff on duty at the bureau did not provide any more information about the music festival.

;

;Liu Rui said that because there are more restrictions in big cities, the trend of large-scale outdoor music festivals developing in third- and fourth-tier cities is very obvious. Local governments choose to cooperate because of the considerations of attracting investment and developing tourism; From the perspective of music fans, it is also a good choice to travel to different cities and experience the customs of different regions while attending music festivals.

;

;Moreover, the music festival ended on October 3, but the National Day holiday has not yet ended. Previously, the usual practice was that many music fans would choose to continue visiting the city where the music festival was held for a few days, and then return Make return arrangements. "So many people come here to eat, drink and play, which can boost the economy." Liu Rui said.

;

;In Liu Rui’s view, before the theft incident, the entire event was actually very successful and basically met the organizer’s expectations. He said that because the lawn of the music festival had just been laid not long ago, after continuous rain, the entire venue was muddy, and it turned into a large-scale "mud war", which became a scene that went viral on major social platforms and short video platforms; in addition, A young man in a wheelchair from Hebei was lifted up by many music fans to pay tribute at the music festival, and it became a classic scene that moved many netizens. These many factors have caused the 2023 Nanyang Midi Music Festival to frequently fail to appear, attracting attention from the outside world.

;

;"It turned out that everything went smoothly, but I didn't expect that something like this happened." Liu Rui felt sorry for Midi and Nanyang.

;
